name: Restless Warrior
description:
one of the first works of Piert Games, the first of a series of developing mini-games. a prototype work for user opinions and fundraising for the development of more projects. We really give thanks for the Itch.io community and the community artitas, the minigame is made with assets from the Itch page, thanks to Rvros, Digital Moons, we are anxious for your gratitude and contribution, we thank you very much for the support that we give with this small project, with it we can promote better projects

How long do you survive in this cursed forest abandoned by God, let's see how far your steps take you, surpass yourself
